text: རྗེ་བཙུན་ཏཱ་ར་ནཱ་ཐའི་གསུང་འབུམ། Works of Tāranātha 多羅那他大師全集

nodes.en: Volume 1, ༼ཀ༽
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas bdag nyid kyi rnam thar nges par brjod pa'i deb gter shin tu zhib mo ma bcos lhug pa'i rtogs brjod ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gsang ba'i rnam thar mdor bsdus pa bzhugs/
gsang ba'i rnam thar 'bring po bzhugs so//
gsang ba'i rnam thar cung zad rgyas pa bzhugs so//
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i rnam thar bstod pa dad pa'i ljon shing zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rdo rje'i gnas pa bcu gnyis shin tu gsang ba nyams rtogs kyi rnam thar lags so//
sangs rgyas rjes dran dang bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi man ngag zung du 'jug pa bzhugs/
rgyal ba'i bka' nges don mdo nyi shu/
rje btsun tā ra nā tha'i zhal gdams mgur 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
lta sgom spyod gsum gyi gdams pa mdo sngags lam gyi snying po bzhugs/
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas pho brang chen po sne'u gdong rtser sbyar ba/
zhal gdams rin chen 'phreng ba bzhugs/
'khor lo rin po che'i gtam bzhugs/
mchog tu gshin pa'i sems kyis gsol ba/
rang gi sems la shar ba'i tshig/
rang gi rtogs pa'i glu dbyangs so//
dge legs dpyid kyi dpal mor gdams pa/
kun 'dzom la/
rang gi rang la 'dzur brdar 'tshal/
sgom chen kun la gnad du che/
tā ra nā thas mai tri dharma bhu ti la gdams pa/
tā ra nā thas sūrya bi dza ya la gdams pa/
dam chos kyi rin chen phreng ba/
zla ri ba grags bzang la gdams pa'o//
dad ldan rnam rgyal la'o//
cha bka' bcu pa la'o//
bdag po sngags 'chang bkras stobs la'o//
kam bka' bcu la gdams pa'o//
gting skyes su chos mchog la'o//
jo nang dbu mdzad rab 'byams pa byams pa ba la'o//
gong dkar rdo rje gdan gyi dgon gnyer dpon la'o//
mdo khams pa nang so kun dga' rin chen la gdams pa phyag chen ngo sprod/
dkon mchog rin chen la gdams pa'o//
rim gnyis lta spyod sgom pa kun ma tshang ba med pa'i gnad bsdus bzhugs/
tshig nyung ba'i chos 'brel zhig
dad ldan gyi slob ma nyi ma rnam rgyal la gdams pa/
yang zhal gdams gcig
bsod nams bu khrid la gdams pa'o//
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas nye bar gdams pa/
nyams len sgrub pa'i man ngag cig
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas don ldan gyi slob bu dge 'dun dpal 'phel la gdams pa/
mdo khams pa shes rab dpal la gdams pa/
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas/ rgyal bzang rtogs ldan rin bkras la gdams pa/
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas smras pa ste/ las stod spa lung gi rnal 'byor pa 'ga' la gdams pa/
mnga' ris se ri ba phyogs su sems ma lha lha tshe ring la mya ngan bsal ba'i don du bskur ba/
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas/ /dad ldan bde skyid dpal 'dzom la gdams pa/
drung pa'o pa la gdams pa/
ngam rings su'o//
dpon mo nam mkha' rgyal mo la chos kyi 'phrin du bskur ba/
bka' mchid nyung ngu tsam zhig smras pa/
grags pa bzang po la'o//
chos rje karma bstan 'dzin la dge bar gdams pa/
kun dga' grags pa la tā ra nā thas gdams pa/
kun dga' bde legs 'dzom la gdams pa/
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas tshogs bye rdzings kyi gtan gcig pa kun dga' rgyal mtshan la gdams pa/
chos rje rin po che spa lung pa la'o//
las stod kyi gnas skor ba 'dra la gdams pa/
zhal gdams dpe rgyan gsal ba bzhugs/
lcam kun dga' 'phrin las dbang mo la gdams pa/
zab mo'i bka' mchid cung zad/
ri khrod pa nam mkha'i seng ge la 'phrin du bskur ba/
tshogs pa'i mkhan chen shākya ri dbang gi thugs dam gsal 'debs su/ tā ra nā thas smras pa'o//
bya btang kun dga' dpal ldan la tā ra nā thas gdams pa/
tā ra nā thas dpon blo gros nam mkha' la gdams pa/
lha bzo ba bod mkhas pa don grub rgyal mtshan dang / rang gi lhan cig spyod pa gtsang ba kun dga' dpal bzang gis bskul nas smras pa/
rig sngags kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba/ sa skyong mi dbang chen po'i bkas bskul nas/ tā ra nā thas smras pa/
zab don sngags kyi lam dang 'brel ba gtso che ba'i mgur ma'i skor bzhugs/
bka' mdo rgyud kyi gnad don ma lus pa don snying por dril ba rgyud/
oṃ ya mā ri de ba maṇḍa la tā ra nā thas smras pa/
'brel med kyi glu bzhugs so//
mkha' ro gangs sbug gi ri khrod du tshogs 'khor gyi gral du glur blangs pa'o//
tā ra nā thas rgyal khams kyi 'gyur lugs 'dra mthong bas/ sems la ngo sprod pa ltar gyur pa'i skabs shig tu glur blangs pa/
tā ra nā thas yar 'brog stag lung du tshogs kyi 'khor lor nges par brjod pa'i glu dbyangs so//
rgyal khams pa tā ra nā thas chos 'khor sdings kyi gnas su tshes bcu'i mtshan mo'i thun dang po la byin pa'i dga' ston gyi tshe glur blangs pa/
tshes bcu'i mtshan mo'i thun dang po la byin pa'i dga' ston gyi tshe glur blangs pa'o//
rang lo nyer lnga pa la ri gong dpal gyi mgon po'i gnas/ rang byung mgon po'i drung du tshogs kyis 'khor lo'i tshe glur blangs pa/
rang gzhan da lta'i chos par rdzu ba mang po'i gnas tshul la yid nges par 'byung nas tā ra nā thas smras pa/
rang gzhan da lta'i chos par rdzu ba mang po'i gnas tshul/
rnal 'byor pa'i rtags bdun/
Volume 2, ༼ཁ༽
dkar chag
dbang mdor bstan gyi 'grel pa zab mo'i don mtha' dag gsal bar byed pa'i nyi ma bzhugs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i chos skor gyi byung khungs nyer mkho bzhugs/
zab lam rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i brgyud 'debs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa dpag bsam ljon shing la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes rgya mtsho'i dgongs don zhes bya ba/
dus 'khor tshogs mchod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga nang gi mun sel gyi lag len bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang chog las rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gong ma'i cho ga bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs ye shes 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal sdom pa chen po'i sgrub dkyil gyi rim pa'i khyad par gsal byed bzhugs so//
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa bzhugs/
dus 'khor sdom chen gyi thig tshon gsal byed bzhugs/
dus 'khor lha dgu'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chog nyer mkho bzhugs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la brten pa'i lho sgo'i cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs/
thun mong ma yin pa'i smon lam rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma bzhugs/
Volume 3, ༼ག༽
dkar chag
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam par bshad pa dngos grub nyer 'tsho zhes bya ba/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par bshad pa bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/
Volume 4, ༼ང༽
dkar chag
zab lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid yig mthong ba don ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid yig mthong ba don ldan gyi lhan thabs 'od brgya 'bar ba bzhugs so//
zab lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi rnam par bshad pa rgyas par bstan pa zung 'jug rab tu gsal ba chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa'i snying po stan thog gcig ma'i khrid yig bzhugs/
rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi phyi'i ngo sprod bzhugs/
sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i ngo sprod nang ma bzhugs so//
rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa'i rtags tshad kyi yi ge bzhugs so//
sbyor drug gegs sel bzhugs so//
sbyor drug gi dri lan bzhugs/
sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i man ngag snying po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sdoms bzhugs so//
zab lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi lus sbyong 'khrul 'khor gyi man ngag gsal byed bzhugs so//
Volume 5, ༼ཅ༽
dkar chag /
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs 'bar ba'i 'od gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub dkyil 'bar ba'i 'od gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i mngon par rtogs pa ye shes snang byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ye shes zhabs lugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes snang byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rim lnga'i 'grel chen rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rim lnga bsdus gsal gyi ṭī ka bzhugs so/ /
gsang 'dus 'phags skor las rim lnga 'gos lugs kyi khrid yig rgyud don gsal ba bzhugs/
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa mi bskyod rdo rje'i bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dngos grub 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs/
gsang 'dus 'phags lugs rim lnga smar khrid gdan rdzogs kyi khrid yig 'khrul ba'i dri bral zhes bya ba mar pa'i dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhugs so/ /
gsang 'dus ye shes zhabs lugs kyi man ngag las/ zab gsal dbyer med kyi khrid yig bzhugs/
dpal grol ba'i thig le'i khrid yig mi shigs pa'i rin po che sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 6, ༼ཆ༽
dkar chag
rgyud rgyal gshin rje gshed skor gyi chos 'byung rgyas pa yid ches ngo mtshar bzhugs so//
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs mdzad chen po'i brgyud 'debs dang bkra shis zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bkra shis/
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs snying po bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ro langs brgyad skor gyi cho ga bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje 'jigs mdzad lha bcu gsum ma'i cho ga 'don pa bsgyur lugs yang dag pa/
bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed nag po lha bcu gsum gyi sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal ldan gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bde chen 'od 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs/
gshin rje gshed nag po'i khrid yig zhang lugs bzhugs/
'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag 'jug gsal bar bstan pa bzhugs so//
gshed dmar rnal 'byor bzhi rim gyi khrid yig mchog tu gsang ba bzhugs/
spros med kyi khrid yig ngo mtshar can bzhugs/
'jam dpal gsang ldan gyi dkyil chog bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor dang 'grel pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gtor chog gi ngag 'don khams gsum zil gnon zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gtor chog khams gsum zil gnon gyi lhan thabs lde'u thung gzhan la med pa'i khyad chos dgra bgegs kun 'joms zhes bya ba bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje 'jigs mdzad chen po'i chos skor la med mi rung gi gal po che/ sgrub pa'i lag len gyi yi ge yang dag pa/
bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba/
rdo rje 'jigs mdzad kyi bsreg blugs bsdus pa sogs bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs mdzad chen po'i tshogs mchod bzhugs/
uṣṇi ṣa rwa lugs kyi ngag 'don rgyun khyer bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams kyi sgrub thabs 'phrin las kyi nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs/
Volume 7, ༼ཇ༽
dkar chag
bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga skal ba bzang po'i 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i brgyud 'debs bzhugs so//
'khor lo sdom pa nag po zhabs lugs kyi sgrub thabs bde ba chen po'i char yangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil chog nag po lugs kyi gsal byed bde ba chen po'i char yangs bzhugs so//
'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs lū yi pa'i lugs bde chen 'jug ngogs bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bde chen 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bde chen snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs/
bde mchog lus dkyil gyi dbang chog bde chen snying po bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams kyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag 'jug gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
'khor lo sdom pa khro bo rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba rdo rje he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
dpal mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog gi sgrub thabs dga' bde rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
mnyam sbyor dkyil chog bzhugs/
'khor lo sdom pa'i lha tshogs kyi bkra shis dge legs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'khor lo sdom pa'i tshogs mchod dge legs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lag mchod bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga dngos grub snye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs/
mkha' 'gro'i spyi gtor rgyas pa bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i cho ga'i yan lag 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor chog chen mo bzhugs/
bde mchog uṣṇi ṣa'i ngag 'don khyer bde ba bzhugs/
bde mchog khro bo reg tshig bzhugs/
Volume 8, ༼ཉ༽
bshad pa rgyas 'grel thun mong ma yin pa lhan cig skyes pa'i gzi 'od phyogs bcur rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bsnyen pa ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs/
dpal rim pa bzhi pa'i gzhung gi 'grel chen gsang ba rab gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'phags pa dpyid kyi thig le'i gzhung rnam par bshad pa 'grel pa nges gsang rgya mtsho'i snying po bzhugs/
grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po spyod pa pa'i dgongs don rim bzhi lam slongs snying por dril ba bzhugs/
dpal bde mchog rim lnga'i khrid yig bzhugs/
bde mchog gi rdzogs rim rnal 'byor chen po'i khrid yig bzhugs/
Volume 9, ༼ཏ༽
dkar chag
bde mchog bstod chen dngos grub 'byung gnas bzhugs/
bde mchog bstod chen gyi rang 'grel phan bde'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 10, ༼ཐ༽
dkar chag
grub chen dzā landha ra'i do ha'i 'grel pa gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs/
grub chen nag po spyod pa'i do ha'i 'grel pa zab don lde mig ces bya ba bzhugs/
kahna pa'i do ha thor bu rnams kyi 'grel pa ngo mtshar 'bar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
tshigs bcad lnga pa/
gsang ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu gsal ba'i 'grel pa dgongs pa rab gsal bzhugs/
de nyid bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa rin chen snye ma bzhugs/
rdo rje theg pa'i gnas lugs gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs/
las dang po pa rnams la phan pa'i rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i nor rdzas zhes bya ba bzhugs/
zab mo sngags kyi dri lan sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyi rim pa nam mkha'i rdo rje rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
zab lam bka' rgya ma bzhugs/
smar khrid tshem bu lugs bzhugs/
snying po don gsum gyi khrid bzhugs/
bka' babs bdun dang ldan pa'i man ngag gi gzhung rdo rje'i lam bzang po zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po bde chen rdo rje shrī māddhe ru ka zhi ba sbas pas mdzad pa bzhugs/
lha so so'i bsnyen pa spyi khyab tu byed tshul bsdus pa bzhugs/
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i mdzad pa'i bsnyen pa byed tshul bzhugs/
gtso 'dus brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dngos grub char 'bebs bzhugs/
rgyud sde lnga'i gtso 'dus kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i mngon rtogs tshigs bcad ma zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i tshes bcu'i cho ga bzhugs/
phun tshogs lnga ldan gyi khrid ces bya ba bzhugs/
badzra bhai ra ba'i sbyin sreg bsdus pa bzhugs/
drag po'i thab bskyed gsang ba spyi'i cho ga nas logs su bkod pa legs par bzhugs/
Volume 11, ༼ད༽
dkar chag
dgyes pa rdo rje'i lag len gsal bar byed pa dpal he ru ka dgyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal kyai rdo rje'i sgrub thabs gong ma'i gsung gi rjes 'brang bzhugs/
dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bi rū pa'i man ngag gong ma'i gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba bzhugs/
dgyes rdor gyi rdzogs rim lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa bzhugs/
dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag sbas pa mig 'byed sogs bzhugs/
zla 'od nyi 'od ces pa/
kyai rdo rje'i rdzogs rim sgron ma gcig pa'i khrid yig ye shes rab gsal bzhugs/
dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rdzogs rim de nyid bzhi ldan gyi khrid yig snying po gsal ba bzhugs/
phyag rgya bzhi'i snying po'i byin rlabs bzhugs/
dgyes rdor mar lugs kyi khrid yig 'khrul med nges gsang zhes bya ba bzhugs/
phyag rgya bzhi pa'i snying po'i man ngag rab gsal nges don snying po bzhugs/
phyag rgya bzhi pa'i snying po'i ṭī ka bzhugs/
dpal mahā mā ya'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs rin chen myu gu zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal mahā mā ya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i khrid yig rgyal ba'i lam bzang zhes bya ba shin tu rnam par dag cing gsal ba bzhugs/
dpal rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen mo mahā mā ya'i rgya cher bshad pa de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i sgrub thabs de kho na nyid gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga de kho na nyid gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thod pa'i rdzogs rim bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ye shes dbang phyug ma lha bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi'i thig le zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bdud rtsi'i thig le zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje gdan bzhi'i khrid yig ye shes sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs/
Volume 12, ༼ན༽
dkar chag
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sgrub cing mchod pa'i cho ga ngag 'don bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bsreg blugs 'bring po'i lag len bzhugs/
phag mo'i sbyin sreg shin tu bsdus pa bzhugs/
rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs chung ba bzhugs/
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bskyed rim gyi man ngag go don dang bcas pa mdo tsam gyi yi ge bde chen rol pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bsnyen thabs bzhugs/
nā ro mkha' spyod kyi rdzogs rim thun mong ma yin pa bzhugs/
rje btsun rngon pa'i gdams ngag las 'byung ba rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rje btsun rngon pa'i gdams ngag gi dmar khrid bzhugs/
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bden gnyis zhal can sgrub cing mchod pa'i cho ga bde ba chen po'i dpal 'bar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
smon lam dang bkra shis bzhugs/
rje btsun rdo rje phag mo don grub ma'i sgrub mchod kyi yi ge bzhugs/
sku gsum rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba dbu bcad mar grags pa'i sgrub mchod ngag 'don bzhugs/
rdo rje phag mo dpyal lugs kyi khrid yig dngos grub kyi 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'phrin las thams cad 'byung ba'i sgrol ma 'dus pa don dam pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bzhugs/
'phrin las thams cad 'byung ba 'dus pa don dam pa las phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bzhugs/
sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi bsdus don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs/
sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs ye shes 'bar ba bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma'i bdag 'jug gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rje btsun sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gzhan la phan pa zhes bya ba rgya gar mkhas pa'i zhal gyi gdams pa phyin ci ma log pa'i yi ge yang dag pa/
sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma'i khrid yig bde chen myur gter bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i rgyud kyi 'byung khungs gsal bar byed pa'i lo rgyus gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gi bstod pa'i rnam par bshad pa bzhugs/
rgyud sde lnga'i brgyud 'debs dngos grub rol mtsho bzhugs/
rgyud sde lnga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal rgyud sde lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga don gsal rgyas byed ces bya ba bzhugs/
ni gu lugs kyi bde mchog lha lnga'i mngon rtogs bzhugs/
ni gu lugs kyi bde mchog lha lnga'i dbang chog bzhugs/
zab lam ni gu chos drug gi khrid yig zab don thang mar brdal ba zhes bya ba klag chog ma bzhugs/
ni gu'i khrid yig bsdus pa bzhugs/
zab lam ni gu chos drug gi gzhung khrid ma mo'i lhan thabs kha skong bzhugs/
ni gu'i 'khrul 'khor rtsa 'grel bzhugs/
Volume 13, ༼པ༽
dkar chag
dpal gtum po khro bo chen po mi g.yo bla med kyi sgrub thabs bdud las rnam par rgyal ba bzhugs so//
dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje rol ba bzhugs so//
dpal 'khor lo chen po'i sgrub thabs srid gsum 'dul byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal phyag na rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil chog srid gsum 'dul byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bdud 'joms rol ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
slob ma la dbang bskur bar byed pa'i tshul bzhugs so//
dpal khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog rol ba'i las byang dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
thams cad rig pa'i brgyud yig gsol 'debs su sbyar ba bzhugs so//
dpal thams cad rig pa'i cho ga 'khor ba kun grol zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
thams cad rig pa'i cho ga 'khor ba kun grol gyi zur 'debs bzhugs/
sbyong rgyud kyi snying po'i don nyi ma'i stobs 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bya ba'i rgyud mtha' dag la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gzungs grwa lnga'i dkyil chog bar chad kun sel bzhugs so//
gzungs grwa lnga'i cho ga la brten nas byad 'grol byed pa'i tshul bzhugs so//
tshe chog bdud rtsi'i chu gter gyi brgyud 'debs bzhugs/
tshe chog bdud rtsi'i chu gter bzhugs so//
tshe dbang lha gcig bum gcig gi cho ga bdud rtsi'i bum pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gtor ma cha gsum lag len bzhugs so//
mngon par dga' ba'i zhing gi smon lam mdo sde'i dgongs don zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 14, ༼ཕ༽
dkar chag
rnam rgyal lha dgu'i sgrub thabs bum chog dang bcas pa bzhugs so//
rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi sgrub thabs bum chog dang bcas pa bzhugs/
dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdul tshon klu la gtod pa'i lag len bzhugs so//
rab gnas kyi cho ga 'gro phan rgyas byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
rab gnas 'gro phan rgyas byed kyi lhan thabs ches rgyas pa bzhugs so//
sātstsha dang khang bu brtsegs pa sogs la rab gnas mdor bsdus bzhugs so//
'chi med 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
bstod pa oṃ nam mkha' dang mnyam nyid ces pa sho lo ka gsum/
rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rnam par 'byed pa gsang ba'i sgron ma bzhugs so//
bla med dang bya rgyud kyi sngags spyi'i thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i zab gnad/ gang gi 'gyur med bde chen pos zhes pa/
rgyas par dga' na rgyas par rgyud sde las zhes pa/
de nas 'dir gzhan yang man ngag gi nges pa sbyin pa zhes pa/
sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i chog sgrig legs par bkod pa ngag 'don rab gsal/
sgrol dkar jo bo lugs kyi mngon rtogs tshe sgrub dang bcas pa bzhugs so//
gsang ba spyi'i cho ga zhi ba las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'bring po bzhugs so//
bla ma mchod pa bde legs rab rgyas zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rje btsun tā ra nā tha'i sku skyes bcu bzhi'i bkra shis bzhugs/
bla ma mchod pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bzhugs so//
bla ma'i rnal 'byor dngos grub 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu bzhugs/
gdon 'grol gyi cho ga shin tu bsdus pa bzhugs so//
klu gtor ji ltar bya ba'i cho ga bzhugs so//
gtor ma brgya rtsa'i ngag 'don bzhugs so//
gsur gyi lag len zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
chu gtor 'jam dpal ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dkar gtor cha bzhi bzhugs so//
gtor ma chen po'i cho ga bar chad kun sel bzhugs so//
ja mchod bdud rtsi'i 'byung gnas dang rigs kun khyab bdag bzhugs so//
yul lha'i bsang mchod bzhugs so//
seng gdong ma'i bzlog pa bzhugs so//
bar do'i ngo sprod mdo tsam brjod pa bzhugs so//
brtan bzhugs dang gsol 'debs sna tshogs kyi skor/
rje btsun dam pa kun dga' snying po'i brtan bzhugs sna tshogs/
las dang po pa'i rim pa phan bde'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gso sbyong gi cho ga dus bzang mchod pa dang bcas pa bzhugs so//
dpal ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs gtor ma'i cho ga dang bcas pa 'phrin las gter mdzod bzhugs/
dpal ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs gtor chog dang bcas pa bzhugs so//
bla ma mgon po dbyer med nyid la bstod pa bzhugs/
dpal ye shes mgon po phyag drug pa'i gtor bzlog bsdus pa'i lag len bzhugs so//
gtor chog snying po gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
bskang gso'i chog sgrig 'phrin las rnam rol bzhugs/
dpal gur gyi mgon po'i dmar chen gtor bzlog gi cho ga bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba bzhugs/
mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i sgos bskang bzhugs so//
mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i bskang gso nyer bsdus bzhugs so//
zhing skyong gzi ldan dbang phyug gi gtor ma chen po sgrub 'phen gyi lag len cho ga las bzhi lhun grub bzhugs so//
lha chen lcam dral gyi sgrub thabs dgra bgegs kun 'joms zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal mgon trakshad kyi bskang gso'i cho ga las bzhi rnam rol bzhugs so//
legs ldan mahā kā la 'khor mang gi bstod pa 'phrin las kun 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs so//
legs ldan nag po trakshad kyi bstod pa bzhugs/
dpal mgon drakshad kyi 'phrin las bskang gso sogs nyer mkho 'ga' zhig bzhugs so//
gtor bzlog bsdus pa bzhugs so//
brtan ma bcu gnyis kyi gtor 'bul bzhugs/
dpal legs ldan nag po trakshad kyi gtor sgrub kyi lag len man ngag bzhugs so//
dpal mgon po'i zungs gso thabs kyi lag len cho ga bzhugs so//
gser skyems bzhugs so//
rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi drag gtor shin tu zab pa rtags mngon gyur can bzhugs so//
dpal lha mo rdo rje rab brtan ma'i bskang ba nyer mkho bzhugs/
dpal lha mo rdo rje rab brtan ma'i gtor chog ngag 'don bzhugs/
yas gtam dang bsngo ba mdor bsdus bzhugs/
smon lam dgos pa kun 'byung bzhugs/
Volume 15, ༼བ༽
dkar chag
yi dam rgya mtsho'i sgrub thabs rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
sgrub thabs brgya rtsa'i lag len gsal byed bzhugs/
Volume 16, ༼མ༽
bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po la bstod pa bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i mdzad pa mdo tsam brjod pa mthong bas don ldan rab tu dga' ba dang bcas pas dad pa'i nyin byed phyogs brgyar 'char ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/
ston pa shākya'i dbang po'i mdzad pa brgya pa'i bris yig rje btsun kun snying gis mdzad pa bzhugs/
dam pa'i chos rin po che 'phags pa'i yul du ji ltar dar ba'i tshul gsal bar ston pa dgos 'dod kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs/
Volume 17, ༼ཙ༽
dkar chag
bka' babs bdun ldan gyi brgyud pa'i rnam thar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rin po che'i khungs lta bu'i gtam zhes bya ba bzhugs/
slob dpon chen po spyod 'chang dbang po'i rnam thar ngo mtshar snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
slob dpon spyod 'chang dbang po'i rnam thar gyi 'phros don kha skong la nye bar mkho zhing grub thob gzhan mang po'i byung tshul rtogs par byed pa'i yi ge yang dag pa/
grub chen buddha gupta'i rnam thar rje btsun nyid kyi zhal lung las gzhan du rang rtog gi dri mas ma sbags pa'i yi ge yang dag pa/
rgyal bu dga' byed sa skyong gi rtogs brjod bzhugs so//
jo nang gi gnas bshad bzhugs/
sgrub gnas skyid phug bde ldan gyi gnas bshad bzhugs so//
'khyog po ri khrod kyi gnas bshad bzhugs so//
dga' ldan phun tshogs gling gi gnas bshad bzhugs/
rtag brtan dam chos gling gi gnas bshad pa/
rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che spyi'i rnam bzhag las 'phros pa'i dpal ldan shangs pa'i chos skor gyi 'byung khungs yid kyi mun sel bzhugs/
dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i mdo don cung zad bshad pa bzhugs/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mdo rnam par bshad pa sngon med legs bshad bzhugs/
sher phyin snying po'i mdo'i tshig 'grel rmad du byung ba bzhugs/
'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'phags mchog rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so//
byams smon gyi 'grel ba bzhugs/
ltung bshags kyi 'grel pa bzhugs so/ /phung po gsum pa'i rgyun bshags kyi don cung zad bshad pa/
tshigs bcad gcig pa'i rnam bshad bzhugs/
tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i rnam bshad bzhugs/
tshigs bcad bzhi pa'i rnam bshad bzhugs/
tshigs bcad nyung ngu'i bstod pa rnam par 'grel pa bzhugs so//
'phags pa sgo drug gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa bzhugs/
tshe mdo'i 'grel ba bzhugs so//
bkra shis kyi rnam bshad bzhugs/
Volume 18, ༼ཚ༽
dkar chag
zab mo gzhan stong dbu ma'i brgyud 'debs zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rgyu 'bras dbu ma'i thig le zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
'ching ba rnam grol gyi 'grel pa bzhugs/
theg mchog shin tu rgyas pa'i dbu ma chen po rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
mthar thug dbu ma chen po 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gnad bstan bcos yid bzhin nor bu lta bu snying po nges pa zhes bya ba grub mtha'i mthar thug bzhugs so//
gzhan stong dbu ma'i rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gzhan stong dbu ma'i rgyan gyi lung sbyor zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gzhan stong snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
tshul gnyis rnam par 'byed pa nges pa'i don gyi 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba nyung ngu rnam gsal dag cing tshang ba bzhugs so//
zab don nyer gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
stong nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba khyad par du 'phags pa bzhugs so//
rgyal ba'i bstan pa la 'jug pa'i rim pa skyes bu gsum gyi man ngag gi khrid yig bdud rtsi'i nying khu zhes bya ba bzhugs/
theg pa chen po blo sbyong don bdun gyi khrid yig bzhugs/
lam mdor bsdus pa bzhugs/
zhib mo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rnam grangs kyi mdo slob phan bzhugs so//
dge bshes dpal ldan shākya bstan 'dzin gyis dri lan gnad kyi gsal byed bzhugs/
stag lung zhabs drung gi gsung lan bzhugs/
rgyal ba'i sku gzugs kyi cha tshad bstan pa bde skyid 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 19, ༼ཛ༽
dkar chag
dpal sgra'i snye ma du ma'i don shes shing rtogs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo bzhugs so//
brda sprod pa dbyangs can gyi mdo 'grel mchog tu gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhug so//
rgya skad du bris pa'i yi ge'i klog thabs 'phags yul mkhas pa'i lugs bzhugs so//
Volume 20, ༼ཝ༽
dkar chag
gsol 'debs rgyal ba kun gyi yab gyur ma'i rang 'grel bzhugs/
nyid kyi gsol 'debs/ phun tshogs dge legs ma/
bde ba can gyi smon lam/
bla ma rgyang 'bod/
zhal gdams/ g.yu nang gi ri la sdod pa'i sgom mo zhig la gdams pa/
'pho ba hika dgu ma bzhugs/
rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa tā ra nā tha'i dgung lo bzhi pa yan gyi rnam thar mdor bsdus zhig bzhugs/
slob dpon chen po padma 'byung gnas kyi rnam par thar pa gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge yid ches gsum ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal ldan bla ma {stag lung pa chen po rje btsun kun dga' bkra shis rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po}'i rnam thar 'phrin las rgya mtsho rnam par rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rje btsun bla ma dam pa kun dga' dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ngo mtshar gser gyi rnga bo che zhes bya ba bzhugs/
grub thob shangs pa bka' rgyud kyi thabs lam gser gyi phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs/
grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'bri tshul zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'chi med grub pa'i zhal lung bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'chi med grub pa'i gdams ngag bzhugs/
'chi med grub pa'i khrid yig gsal bar ma thon pa'i man ngag 'jug tshul zhes bya ba bzhugs/

rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rtsen ma'i skur ston pa'i zhal lung / grub brnyes kyi slob dpon ha ra dā ras mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim de nyid gsal ba dang / rig pa 'dzin ma rtsen ma'i sgrub thabs gnyis kyi dka' 'grel rdzogs rim gyi yig chung slob dpon de nyid las brgyud pa'i man ngag /dbang bzhi pa'i rab byed rnams bzhugs/
bka' babs drug ldan gyi khrid yig 'phags yul grub pa'i zhal lung /
blo sbyongs don bdun ma'i bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs/
snying po don gsum gyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs/
phyag rgya chen po ga'u ma'i rang babs rnam gsum zhes bya ba'i khrid yig bzhugs/
phyag rgya chen po rang babs rnam gsum gyi dogs pa gcod pa'i lan zhes bya ba bzhugs/
ye shes mkha' 'gro nai gu'i dbang bka' che chung rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bcu dang lngar dbye ba'i khyad par bzhugs/
nai gus brgyud 'debs a yig chos 'byung ma zhes bya ba bzhugs/
sgyu lus dbang mo che bskur tshul gyi lag len zhes bya ba bzhugs/
gser chos phyi ma bzhi'i snying po sogs bzhugs/
rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis kyi rtsa ba bzhugs/
rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis kyi gsal byed kyi ṭī ka bi dzā ha ri pā ru bzhugs/
mkha' 'gro rnam gsum gyi gdams pa bzhugs/
mkha' 'gro rnam gsum gyi zhal gdams gung bsgrigs te nyams su len bde ba bzhugs/
lam khyer rnam gsum gcig tu dril ba bzhugs/
gcod yul zab mo'i khrid yig gnad don snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs/
gcod yul brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs/
gsol 'debs dgongs bskyod ma/
gcod dbang nam mkha' sgo 'byed du grags pa zhes bya ba'i dbu phyogs legs par bzhugs pa lags/
'pho ba'i man ngag bzhugs/
phyir bzlog drug gi khrid yig tshigs bcad ma zhugs/
khrid yig tshigs bcad ma'i zhal shes bzhugs/
dpal ldan ka lā par 'jug pa zhes bya ba yul rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa sham bha lar 'gro tshul gyi lam yig 'phags pa don yod lcags kyus gsungs pa bzhugs/
Volume 21, ༼ཞ༽
dkar chag
rgyud sde spyi'i rnam bzhag gi zin bris bstan pa'i nor rdzas zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal rgyud sde lnga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed rim mtha' dag gsal bar byed pa bzhugs so//
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs rang byin rlabs pa'i man ngag bzhugs so//
rje btsun seng ge sgra'i bsgom zlas bzhugs/
rje btsun seng ge sgra'i bstod pa bzhugs/
rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor gtso/ /sgrub thabs grub pa'i zhal lung mchog /'phags yul mkhas pa'i gsung dri med/ /yi ge'i lam du mtshon pa'o//
kyai rdo rje'i lus dkyil lam dus kyi dbang chog tā ra nā thas mdzad pa bzhugs so//
dpal kyai rdo rje'i bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad rig 'dzin gzhon nu'i rol rtsed ces bya ba rgyud don mtha' dag gsal ba bzhugs/
kyai rdo rje'i bskyed rim gyi bshad pa bzhugs so//
'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan nges pa'i ṭīkka 'grel pa rnams kyi lugs su sbyar ba bzhugs so//
rje btsun rdo rje grags pa'i zhal gzigs pa'i lugs su grags pa ma mo srog gzer gyi sgrub thabs klag chog bzhugs so//
klu bsang bsdus pa bzhugs/
rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma ra mdar bos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
'byung bzhi'i gtor chog bzhugs/
brgya bzhi'i cho ga jo nang lugs zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rdo rje 'jigs byed bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs dang slob ma rjes 'dzin bzhugs so//
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa byed lugs kyi lag len dngos grub kun stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa byed tshul bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gtor ma'i cho ga khams gsum zil gnon gyi dmigs rim gyis man ngag gi yi ge snying dang 'dra ba/ gzhan la gsang ba'i man ngag bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad skor gyi dbang dang brgyud bshad man ngag dang bcas pa'i bla ma brgyud pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs bcad bzhugs so//
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs/
dam can chos kyi rgyal po las kyi gshin rje'i man ngag gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba bzhugs so//
bsrung 'khor rdo rje brag rdzong ma rgyas pa'i khrid yig 'dus gsal tshang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
mgon po trakshad kyi chos 'byung dang gtor rgyag thams cad kyi man ngag gzhan la med pa'i khyad chos zhal rgyun gser gyi thig pa bzhugs so//
nags sman gtor chog bdud rtsi thig pa zhes bya ba lha btsan gyi gtor bsngo dang bcas pa bzhugs/
dpal nag po chen po'i sbyin sreg mdor bsdus pa bzhugs/
sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma la brten pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
phyag drug pa'i bsang mchod bstan pa 'phel byed zhes bya ba bzhugs/
ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i chos skor gyi byung tshul mdo tsam brjod pa bzhugs so//
rwa lugs mgon nag gi las tshogs ches zab pa lag len ma bzhugs/
mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i mchod bskang dngos grub kun stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
myur mdzad mgon po phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad ma bzhugs so//
myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i gtor chog bsdus pa bzhugs/
dmar nag 'jigs gsum las bzhi'i gtor ma bsdus pa nyin gcig rdzogs pa'i dbu bzhugs so//
dpal legs ldan nag po drakshad lcam dral gyi gtor chog zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
bshes pa'i 'phrin yig gi 'grel pa rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa tā ra nā tha'i gsung bzhin sde srid phun tshogs rnam rgyal gyis zin bris bgyis pa bzhugs/
badzra bhai ra ba'i las mkhan legs ldan lha'i mgon po'i sgrub thabs las sbyor dang bcas pa'i lag len bzhugs/
Volume 22, ༼ཟ༽
myang yul stod smad bar gsum gyi ngo mtshar gtam gyi legs bshad mkhas pa'i 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rje btsun bla ma 'jam mgon grub pa'i dpa' bo'i rnam thar/
rje btsun bla ma dam pa rdo rje 'chang chen po kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi rnam par thar pa dge legs kun gyi 'byung gnas dad pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi snying po bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i maṇḍal bzhi pa'i cho ga nyer mkho 'phrin las snye ma 'dod don kun 'byung bzhugs so//
'phags pa thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal gyi bsnyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga thar mchog rin chen khang bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 23, ༼འ༽
dkar chag
bla ma rgyang 'bod bzhugs/
zhal gdams thor bu bzhugs/
snying po bsdus pa bzhugs so//
phar phyin gyi khrid yig ngo mtshar can bzhugs so//
dogs gcod mun sel bzhugs/
tshigs bcad bcu pa zhes bya ba lam gyi rim pa bzhugs so//
phyag rgya chen po mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid yig bzhugs so//
man ngag khrid yig shin tu zab pa bzhugs/
grub chen lwa ba pa'i gdams pa skal ldan cig char ba'i tshul du ngo sprod pa'i thabs snyan rgyud lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gsol 'debs bzhugs/
rdo rje'i lam la 'jug pa bzhugs so//
mngon brjod bla ma las 'byung ba'i dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu dang spel mar sbyar ba bzhugs/
gso sbyong rang gis blang ba'i cho ga bzhugs/
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i mngon par rtogs pa 'dod dgu'i rgya mtsho bzhugs so//
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rje btsun 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i lha tshogs mnyes par byed pa'i cho ga mchod sprin rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ye shes zhabs lugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes snang byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po lha lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'khrul pa'i dri bral bzhugs so//
phyag rdor gtum chen gyi sgrub thabs rgyas pa bzhugs so//
phyag na rdo rje gtum po'i dbang gi tho yig bzhugs/
'khor lo sgyur drug gi sgrub thabs phun tshogs thams cad bskyed pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rnam par bkod pa ngo mtshar 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'khor lo sdom pa bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs me tri pa'i dgongs don zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'khor lo bde mchog bong zhal can gyi sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'khor lo bde mchog drag po chen po'i sgrub thabs mngon brjod bla ma las gsal bar gsungs pa bzhugs/
dril bu lha lnga'i sgrub thabs gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs bde ba bskyed ma zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs bde chen 'bar byed bzhugs/
rdo rje phag mo phag gdong can gyi sgrub thabs ye shes rab 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs/
'phrin las thams cad 'byung ba'i sgrol ma 'dus pa don dam pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bzhugs so//
'phrin las thams cad 'byung ba 'dus pa don dam pa las phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bzhugs so//
Volume 24, ༼ཡ༽
rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa bzhugs/
shin tu spros med kyi man ngag dam pa'i nying khu bzhugs/
gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje'i brgyud 'debs bzhugs/
shangs pa bka' brgyud kyi brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bzhugs/
skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gyi brgyud 'debs bzhugs/
'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal ba rgyal sras slob dpon chen po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum la phyag 'tshal bstod pa'i rab byed bzhugs/
gu ru'i gsol 'debs bzhugs/
rtsa ba'i bla ma rje btsun brag stod pa chen po'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs sogs bzhi bzhugs/
rtsa ba'i bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa'i skor las/ bla ma'i rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i bla ma thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa bzhugs so//
rje btsun dam pa kun dga' bkra shis kyi zhabs la bstod pa bzhugs/
rje btsun dpal stag lung pa mchog gi sprul pa'i sku'i zhal mnga' la bstod pa bzhugs/
bla ma dam pa shrī mān dharmma bha dra'i zhabs la bstod pa bzhugs/
grub pa'i dbang phyug rje brag stod pa gang gi zhabs brtan bzhugs/
chos kyi rje kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyi zhabs la bstod pa bzhugs/
dpal ldan bla ma'i tshogs la bstod pa dang brtan bzhugs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams bzhugs/
rje btsun kun dga' rgyal mtshan la gsol 'debs bzhugs/
rnal 'byor dbang phyug buddhaguptanātha'i yon tan rjes su dran pa'i bstod pa bzhugs/
grub chen buddha gupta'i rnam thar bzhugs/
khrid brgya brgyud pa'i lo rgyus kha skong bzhugs so//
rigs ldan gyi sprul gzhi gsal byed yig chung mthong grol lags/
shin tu gsang ba rang snang nyams kyi chos skor 'ga' zhig bzhugs so//
'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i dka' 'grel 'gran zla med pa'i rgyal po tshig le'ur byas pa bzhugs so//
theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhugs so//
sems kyi phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i lung rdo rje theg pa mtha' dag gsal bar byed pa bzhugs/
yi ge bzhi'i sgron ma bzhugs so//
gdan bzhi'i rgyud don tshol ba'i tshigs bcad bzhugs/
gdan bzhi'i rgyud la 'jug pa dngos grub snye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rnam grol snye ma zhes bya ba'i glu bzhugs/
de kho na nyid bdun gyi 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas sbas pas mdzad pa bzhugs/
ni gu'i chos drug gi khrid yig bzhugs so//
'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bstod pa bla na med pa'i yon tan 'phel bar byed pa 'phel ba'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bstod pa bsdus pa bzhugs/
'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs/
phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
dran pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bde chen myur du sgrub pa'i thabs bzhugs so//
skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin bdag bskyed bzhugs/
rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dag pa bzhugs/
mahā ma ya'i sngags dbyibs chos gsum gyi tshigs bcad bzhugs/
dbang bzhi pa'i 'grel chung bzhugs so//
rdo rje phag mo'i mtshan don bzhugs/
phyag na rdo rje 'gro bzang lugs kyi sgrub thabs kyi rnam bshad gsang bdag dgyes pa'i mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lhan skyes la bstod pa dngos grub kyi gter chen zhes bya ba bzhugs so/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim gnyis la bstod pa bzhugs/
'jam dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la rim gnyis kyi sgo nas bstod pa bzhugs/
dges pa'i rdo rje la bstod pa glur blangs pa bung ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rgyal dbang tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bstod pa bzhugs/
ngam rings byams chen du phul ba bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' la bstod pa dga' ba'i glu dbyangs bzhugs/
'jam dbyangs dmar ser la bstod pa bzhugs/
'jam dbyangs dkar po la bstod pa bzhugs/
dbyangs can ma la bstod pa bzhugs/
'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa bzhugs/
zar byang phug gi jo bo lokeshwar la bstod pa bzhugs/
khro rgyal rta mgrin la bstod pa bzhugs/
myur mdzad mahā kā la'i las mdzad rnams la bstod pa bzhugs/
mgon po phyag drug pa'i bstod pa gsum bzhugs/
byang ngam rings kyi mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i sku 'dra la phul ba bzhugs/
gtsang bde mchog rtse'i byams pa la phul ba bzhugs/
'phags ma nor rgyun ma bstod pa bzhugs/
grub chen dza landha ra'i zhabs kyi do ha rnam grol snye ma'i dgongs don bzhugs so//
gu ru lho phyogs pa'i man ngag bzhugs/
'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag mchog dran pa gcig pa zhes bya bzhugs/
dran pa gcig pa'i rang 'grel bzhugs/
dran pa gcig pa bzhugs/
sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag bzhugs/
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pa bzhugs/
bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
phag mo skor gsum bzhugs so//
rngon pa'i man ngag
rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbas pa'i sgom pa/
phag mo rnam pa lnga'i sgrub thabs dang a ti sha'i chos drug gi khrid yig lags/
rdo rje phag mo'i ming gi nges tshig bzhugs/
rnal 'byor ma'i bstod pa dang bshags pa bzhugs/
rdo rje phag mo'i bsnyen pa dang las rim bdun te sgrub las bdun can gyi man ngag bzhugs/
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dī na kā ra yi man ngag bzhugs/
rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug dī na ka ra lugs kyi byin rlabs bzhugs/
rnal 'byor ma dī na ka ra'i lugs kyi rdzogs rim bzhugs/
rje btsun ma dkar dmar sngo ba gsum dang ngang pa'i rdo rje ma ca co sgrog ma ste lnga po'i byin rlabs bzhugs/
rje btsun sgrol ma'i mtshan nyer brgyad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma'i khrid yig bde ba chen po myur du ster ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thod pa'i rdzogs rim bzhugs so//
tshogs mchod nor bu'i phreng ba bzhugs/
'pho ba dang tshe sgrub kyi gdams pa bzhugs/
gshin rje gshed dmar po lhan skyes kyi sgrub thabs bsdus pa bzhugs/
gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgo nas nad dang bar chad zhi bar byed tshul bzhugs/
mgon po phyag drug pa'i gzhung rgyas pa rtsod bral snga 'gyur la 'gyur chad bsabs shing 'gyur bcos pa bzhugs so//
legs ldan drakshad lcam dral gyi bskang gso'i rim pa snying por gyur pa bzhugs/
legs ldan nag po'i bstod bskul nyer 'kho 'ga' shas bzhugs/
khri dpon kun dga' grags pa zhes bya ba la nye bar gdams pa bzhugs/
rnam bcu dbang ldan dang rgyud sde bzhi'i gsal byed sogs bzhugs/
sbyor ba yan lag drug gi don snying por bstan pa bzhugs/
yi ge gcig pa'i mngon brjod kyi gzhung /
gsar 'gyur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs blo gros zla ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
rje btsun tā ra nā tha'i sku skyes bcu bzhi'i gsol 'debs bzhugs so//
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs spyod 'chang dbang po'i lugs bzhugs so//
rje btsun ma rig byed ma'i sgrub thabs so//
dga' ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba lha mo zla 'od ma'i lo rgyus zhes bya ba bzhugs/
gshin rje gshed dmar po'i bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad 'khrul pa kun 'joms zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
mkha' 'gro ma glu mo dbyangs kyi gsang ba'i rnam thar bzhugs so//
padma dbang gi rgyal po'i dmigs skor bdun pa bzhugs/
dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas za tshogs bsdus pa sogs bzhugs/
rje btsun ma sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma'i bstod pa bzhugs so//
bum gter bzhag pa'i cho ga bzhugs/
gzhi bdag khrus gsol bzhugs/
Volume 25, ༼ར༽
bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs/
bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las bshad pa'i rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs/
bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs so//
bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs so//
par du ji ltar grub pa'i tshul/
